messages.title: Don't be conned by the Conservatives
messages.content: Voters won't be fooled by Conservative desperate tactics. Tory campaign chief Lord Ashcroft is spending millions of pounds at the election - but Liberal Democrat MPs have a strong record of action that can't be matched.

messages.title: Only the Liberal Democrats will deliver for you
messages.content: It was Nick Clegg's Lib Dems who delivered a tax cut worth £700 to ordinary people. It's Liberal Democrats who have the only fully costed, credible plan to deliver real change for a fairer society.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats delivered a tax cut worth £700 to ordinary people.
Liberal Democrats have the only fully costed, credible plan to deliver real change for a fairer society.
